TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InstallerCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase

summary.span: 包含要在安装过程中运行的安装程序的集合。

span.span: Contains a collection of installers to be run during an installation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供方法和属性，你的应用程序需要管理集合的对象。The provides the methods and properties that your application needs to manage a collection of objects. 使用任何以下三种方法添加到集合的安装程序：Use any of the following three ways to add installers to the collection: - 方法向集合中添加单个安装程序。The method adds a single installer to the collection. - 方法添加到集合的多个安装程序。The methods add multiple installers to the collection. - 方法和属性，它是索引器，每个将单个安装程序添加到集合中指定索引处。The method and the property, which is the indexer, each add a single installer to the collection at the specified index. 删除安装程序通过方法。Remove installers through the method. 通过检查是否安装程序已在集合中使用方法。Check whether an installer is in the collection by using the method. 查找安装程序集合中位于使用方法。Find where an installer is located in the collection by using the method. 集合中的安装程序运行时包含该集合，由指定的安装程序属性、 调用其， ， ，或方法。The installers in a collection are run when the installer containing the collection, as specified by the property, calls their , , , or methods. 安装程序集合的用法的示例，请参阅和类。For examples of the usage of an installer collection, see the and classes. ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法类。The following example demonstrates the method of the class. 本示例提供了类似于实现[Installutil.exe （安装程序工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)。This example provides an implementation similar to that of [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md). 它与前面的该特定的程序集的选项一起安装的程序集。It installs assemblies with the options preceding that particular assembly. 如果没有为程序集指定一个选项，如果在列表中没有以前的程序集获得前一个程序集的选项。If an option is not specified for an assembly, the previous assembly's options are taken if there is a previous assembly in the list. 如果"/ u"或"/ 卸载"选项指定，则卸载程序集。If the "/u" or "/uninstall" option is specified, the assemblies are uninstalled. 如果"/？"If the "/?" 或"/ 帮助"提供选项，则向控制台显示帮助信息。or "/help" option is provided, the help information is displayed to the console. [!code-cpp[InstallerCollection_Add#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallerCollection_Add/CPP/installercollection_add.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[InstallerCollection_Add#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallerCollection_Add/CS/installercollection_add.cs#1)] [!code-vb[InstallerCollection_Add#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallerCollection_Add/VB/installercollection_add.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的每个添加的属性设置为包含此集合。The property of each added is set to the containing this collection. ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法和方法类。The following example demonstrates the method and the methods of the class. 它将创建的实例`MyAssembly1.exe`和`MyAssembly2.exe`。It creates instances for `MyAssembly1.exe` and `MyAssembly2.exe`. 这些实例添加到名为`myTransactedInstaller1`。These instances of are added to a named `myTransactedInstaller1`. 中的安装程序`myTransactedInstaller1`复制到另一个名为`myTransactedInstaller2`。The installers in the `myTransactedInstaller1` are copied to another named `myTransactedInstaller2`. 安装过程将同时`MyAssembly1.exe`和`MyAssembly2.exe`。The installation process installs both `MyAssembly1.exe` and `MyAssembly2.exe`.
